subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
Perhaps an {{liushu|i|nocap=1}} generated by replacing uppermost stroke of {{zh-l|*正|straight; right}} with a slanted stroke {{zh-l|*丿}} — not right; lacking.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=fá
|c=fat6
|h=gd=fad6
|mn=hoa̍t/ha̍t

|mn-t=huag8/huêg8/hêg8/hak8
|mn-t_note=huag8/huêg8 - literary (huêg8 - Chaozhou); hêg8 - vernacular (“tired”); hak8 - vernacular (“to lack”)
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,a
}}
